roleset.name: describe in detail
roleset.note: DETAIL-V NOTES: Might take an arg2"listener", but we'll wait and see. (from detail.01-v)

example.name: boring
example.text: MiniScribe filed a status report with the NASD on Monday, detailing its efforts to comply with listing requirements and requesting an extension of the exception, but hasn't received a response.
example.arg: its efforts to comply with listing requirements
